title: 2004년 Brian Christian Abram v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Brian Christian Abram v. State. 판결일: 2004-01-08. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Brian Christian Abram v. State
**판결일**: 2004-01-08
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약


















                                                             11th
Court of Appeals

                                                                  Eastland,
Texas

                                                                        Opinion

 

Brian Christian Abram

Appellant

Vs.                   No. 11-02-00368-CR B Appeal from Dallas County

State of Texas

Appellee

 

A jury convicted appellant, Brian Christian Abram,
of capital murder.  The trial court
assessed the required punishment of confinement for life.  In his first two points of error, appellant
argues that there was legally and factually insufficient evidence to prove that
he intentionally killed Johnny Barrett, Sr. 
In his third and fourth points of error, appellant argues that there was
legally and factually insufficient evidence to prove that appellant robbed or
attempted to rob Johnny Barrett, Sr.  In
his fifth point of error, appellant argues that the trial court erred in
instructing the jury on the law of conspiracy. 
In his sixth point of error, appellant argues ineffective assistance of
counsel.  We affirm.

                                                                Background
Facts

Barrett and his wife, Fannie Barrett, lived with
their two sons, Johnny Barrett, Jr. (Junior) and Jacoby Barrett, in a Dallas
apartment.  After losing his job because
of a back injury, Barrett began to sell marihuana.  One of his custome...
